name: PALMER JOHNSON 30 (AQUAFIBRE)
notes:
(S&S Design #2014) The first of 2 versions of the PJ30. (both by S&S but different designs). It is the same  as S&S 30, built by Aquafibre - Rackheath, UK. Aquafibre also sold the boat as the AQUA 30.
The second version, see PALMER JOHNSON 30(HUGHES)(S&S design #2098) was built by Hughes Boat Works in Centralia, Ontario, CAN. Hughes sold this latter boat as the NORTHSTAR 1000.  
Thanks to Owen McCall, PJ-30 owner, for supplying information on the different versions of the S&S 30.
